data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Frolov, Andrey V., Vaz-De-Mello, Fernando Z. (2015): A new genus and species of Orphninae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) associated with epiphytes in an Andean cloud forest in Ecuador. Zootaxa 4007 (3): 433-436, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4007.3.10
